abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews musical program Eastern Wind, featuring Middle Eastern and Indian-inspired works performed by American Composers Orchestra and conducted by George Manahan, at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: This group’s premiere-heavy event at Zankel Hall drew on several sources for inspiration, including Ottoman techniques and North Indian rhythms.

headline.main: Review: American Composers Orchestra Concert Tilts Eastward
headline.print_headline: Absorbing and Distilling With an Eastward Tilt

snippet: This group’s premiere-heavy event at Zankel Hall drew on several sources for inspiration, including Ottoman techniques and North Indian rhythms.
